name: Metro Style Social Widget
author: Manivannan Muthaiyan

sections.description:
A light weight wordpress widget that displays Metro Style social network icons in Sidebar and links to your social network profiles.

Add button option will display the Like / Follow button on the Social icons so that your users can immediately Like / Follow your page or profile without leaving your site.

Since every one use Facebook and Twitter, we made them as default and other network as optional.

Update

Color Picker added, Now you can set any color to any icons in the widget.

On Users request Google+ and RSS Feed are now optional.

If needed you can display Google+, Linkedin, Youtube, RSS Feed and Pinterest else choose don’t show option in widget settings.

Responsive design, Plugin will automatically fit within your siderbar width else you can specify width for the widget.

Next Release will Include the Below Feature

  • User side configuration / customization in Widget admin page
  • More Styles

Support / Contact

  • More Info / DEMO
  • Developer Blog: Aidful.com

Sponsors

  • SpecificFeeds

If you like this plug-in, please don’t forget to rate this plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Download the zip file and upload it using upload option in your wordpress dashbord under Plugins-> Add New.

  2. Activate the plugin.

  3. Goto Appearence-> widget, Now just drag and drop the Metro Style Social widget in sidebar.

  4. Type the ID / Username of your Social Networks sites and save it.

  5. That’s it, Hope you enjoy the Plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

*Moved all the screenshot files to assets, Reduced plugin file size.

1.0.1

*New Widget settings & added color picker to it.

0.9.15

*Fixed bug & updated to support 4.5.2

0.9.10

*Added SpecificFeeds option to the plugin.

0.9.9

*Fixed CSS for RSS, YouTube, Twitter long button’s.

0.9.8

*RSS Feed settings changed, now custom Feed URL can be used.

0.9.7

*Modified readme file

0.9.6

*Google+ and RSS Feed are optional now.

0.9.5

*Fixed CSS for Youtube subscribe button

0.9.4

*Fixed Youtube subscribe button

0.9.3

*Fixed LinkedIn button for Member / Company profile and added Youtube subscribe button

0.9.2

*Modified the readme.txt file

0.9.1

*Tested with 3.6

0.9

*Bug Fixed: Google+ link not redirected to the correct page & Autofix option added.

0.8

*Modified CSS

0.7

*Bug Fixed: Like / Follow button not displayed on some themes.

0.6

*Bug Fixed: Unable to view widget on some themes.

0.5

*User can specify the width for the widget, By default it will automatically fit with the sidebar width

0.4

*Fixed width problem, Now Plugin is Responsive

0.3

  • Corrections to 0.2

0.2

  • Solved Linkedin URL / ID

0.1

  • Initial release
